packets.parameters

Class ChoiceOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • packets.parameters.ChoiceOption

  • public final class ChoiceOption
extends java.lang.Object
    FULLY DOCUMENTED. This class represents one choice that the user could make at the 'input parameters' screen of a 'send command' window. It has a name and a value. If the name is chosen in the GUI, the value will be encoded in the command packet.
    Author:
    Joe Benassi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChoiceOption(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value)
      Creates a ChoiceOption with the input name and value.

      Returns the name of this option, as it would appear in the GUI.
      static java.lang.String[] getNames(ChoiceOption[] choiceOptions)
      Returns a String containing all the names of the input ChoiceOptions.
      java.lang.String getValue()
      Returns the value of this option; the value that would be encoded in a command packet if this was chosen.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChoiceOption

        public ChoiceOption(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String value)
        Creates a ChoiceOption with the input name and value.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of this ChoiceOption as it would display in the GUI.
        value - The value that this ChoiceOption would output if this ChoiceOption was chosen by the user.

        Returns:
